TopicTitle: Opening up forum attachments for files

Articles.Content:
Very nooby question.

Whenever i go on the forums, people attach there .craft file for download. However not all of them have blue hyper links. sometimes i don\'t see any link at all. I\'m guessing theres a mysterious invisible link somewhere. Any help?

Very nooby question.

Whenever i go on the forums, people attach there .craft file for download. However not all of them have blue hyper links. sometimes i don\'t see any link at all. I\'m guessing theres a mysterious invisible link somewhere. Any help?

Not sure what your issue is. What browser and version are you using? Do you have an plugins that would modify links? No one else has reported this issue so I suspect it\'s browser related.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
i use google chrome. Is there some sort of image im supposed to click on? those paper clip images are purely images not links...

Try a different browser is the only thing I can suggest. Links and downloads are working fine for everyone else.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Links and downloads are working fine for everyone else.

I guarantee. (Google Chrome, Windows 8 Developer Preview)

Im not talking about the link themselves, its just that I CAN\'T find a link.

e.g

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Forum guy 1: OMG i created a super awesome ship design to defeat the ship kraken!

.craft file is posted also for a quick download!

(Image here)

Other Forum Pepole: OMG it works tyvm!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Me: WHERE THA LINK?

Post a link to a thread that contains the issue you are having. Also, if you could upload a screenshot of the page so we can see what you see.

I\'m still leaning towards you having local issues with your browser since no one else seems to have this problem.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
